name: Alumni Fireside Chat #11 - Victor & Gregory
description:
Join us for the 11th Alumni Fireside Chat! This exciting bi-monthly event brings together former 42 students for an engaging online discussion (in English).

For this edition, get to meet and ask your questions live to:
- Victor Olivry, 42 Lyon (2017), Level 12. After working as a Bocalien at 42 Lyon, Victor is now Product Owner at OVHcloud.
- Gregory Potemkin, School 21 (2019), Level 16. Gregory is the Co-founder & CPO of Lemon AI.

We look forward to welcoming you to this inspiring talk!

REGISTER HERE => https://zoom.us/webinar/register/6217218943699/WN_Zp5_cqm7Sn63pVGGZ7a0TA

name: Alumni Meet-Up: Jovien Chappex, Co-Founder of Urgentime
description:
You might recognize Jovien Chappex from 42 Paris (cohort 2014), or perhaps from his appearance on the TV show "Qui veut √™tre mon associ√©" (the French version of Shark Tank), where he and his co-founder secured ‚Ç¨750,000. One thing is certain: Jovien has invaluable insights to share with the 42 community. Join us on Tuesday, October 1st at 6:30 PM (CET) for an engaging session on MedTech opportunities, entrepreneurial resilience, and strategies for breaking into the US market.

Register now: https://zoom.us/webinar/register/4217247519383/WN_PhhWq6hjSp21nR6ai08Lcg

name: 42 Prague x ≈†koda Auto Hackathon
description:
We are happy to announce the **42 Prague x ≈†koda Auto Hackathon!** Here are the logistical deets:
- **Location**: 42 Prague campus, AFI City Tower, Kolbenova 1021/9, 190 00 Prague, Czechia
- **Time**: October 11th, 14th, and 15th
- **Topic**: Smart Theft Prevention for ≈†koda
- **Teams**: 3-5 people

Your task is to design an innovative solution to enhance theft prevention and user notifications for ≈†koda vehicles. Your mission is to creatively utilize the ≈†koda Connect app and develop effective notification methods like robotic phone calls. Improve the user experience and security by addressing current limitations in GPS modules and app alerts. Imagine your solution as an integral part of the ≈†koda ecosystem, providing seamless and reliable protection for car owners.
The event will feature networking, hacking, pitching, and an awards ceremony. So this will be a great chance to develop yourself in all of these areas.

**[You can read this guide](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ZjkNiR-cqDeCDNr-ckDXbFVhtmfNCYoio2srqNbwBSg/edit?usp=sharing)** for all of the event specifics and timeline, but I'll list a few important pieces of information below. You'll apply via the registration form linked in the guide above.

This is open to 42 Prague students and to other 42 campuses worldwide. **Applications are filled on a first-come, first-served basis** (with the exception of the team per outside campus rule). There are 40 available spaces for 42 Prague students and 20 spaces for students from 42 campuses worldwide.

You can join as a team or individual, where you could potentially join people from other campuses on the first day of the hackathon (October 11). The ultimate deadline for registration is **September 30th**.

You can direct any questions to Brian (brian@42prague.com) or Lucia (lucia@42prague.com)

[GOOGLE CALENDAR LINK](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/render?action=TEMPLATE&text=42+Prague+x+%C5%A0koda+Auto+Hackathon&dates=20241011T080000Z%2F20241015T160000Z&details=We+are+happy+to+announce+%2A%2A42+Prague+x+%C5%A0koda+Auto+Hackathon%21%2A%2A+Here+are+the+logistical+deets%3A%0D%0A-+%2A%2ALocation%2A%2A%3A+42+Prague+campus%2C+AFI+City+Tower%2C+Kolbenova+1021%2F9%2C+190+00+Prague%2C+Czechia%0D%0A-+%2A%2ATime%2A%2A%3A+October+11th%2C+14th%2C+and+15th%0D%0A-+%2A%2ATopic%2A%2A%3A+Smart+Theft+Prevention+for+%C5%A0koda%0D%0A-+%2A%2ATeams%2A%2A%3A+3-5+people%0D%0A%0D%0AYour+task+is+to+design+an+innovative+solution+to+enhance+theft+prevention+and+user+notifications+for+%C5%A0koda+vehicles.+Your+mission+is+to+creatively+utilize+the+%C5%A0koda+Connect+app+and+develop+effective+notification+methods+like+robotic+phone+calls.+Improve+the+user+experience+and+security+by+addressing+current+limitations+in+GPS+modules+and+app+alerts.+Imagine+your+solution+as+an+integral+part+of+the+%C5%A0koda+ecosystem%2C+providing+seamless+and+reliable+protection+for+car+owners.%0D%0AThe+event+will+feature+networking%2C+hacking%2C+pitching%2C+and+an+awards+ceremony.+So+this+will+be+a+great+chance+to+develop+yourself+in+all+of+these+areas.%0D%0A%0D%0A%2A%2A%5BYou+can+read+this+guide%5D%28https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.google.com%2Fdocument%2Fd%2F1ZjkNiR-cqDeCDNr-ckDXbFVhtmfNCYoio2srqNbwBSg%2Fedit%3Fusp%3Dsharing%29%2A%2A+for+all+of+the+event+specifics+and+timeline%2C+but+I%27ll+list+a+few+important+pieces+of+information+below.+You%27ll+apply+via+the+registration+form+linked+in+the+guide+above.%0D%0A%0D%0AThis+is+open+to+42+Prague+students+and+to+other+42+campuses+worldwide.+%2A%2AApplications+are+filled+on+a+first-come%2C+first-served+basis%2A%2A+%28with+the+exception+of+the+team+per+outside+campus+rule%29.+There+are+40+available+spaces+for+42+Prague+students+and+20+spaces+for+students+from+42+campuses+worldwide.%0D%0A%0D%0AYou+can+join+as+a+team+or+individual%2C+where+you+could+potentially+join+people+from+other+campuses+on+the+first+day+of+the+hackathon+%28October+11%29.+The+ultimate+deadline+for+registration+is+%2A%2ASeptember+30th%2A%2A.%0D%0A%0D%0AYou+can+direct+any+questions+to+Brian+%28brian%4042prague.com%29+or+Lucia+%28lucia%4042prague.com%29&location=42+Prague+Campus)

name: Forum Recrutement Partenaires 42 Lyon #3
description:

name: ETHLisbon 2024 Hackaton
description:
If you're into decoding challenges on privacy, identity and web3 in general, don't miss out on the chance to join the next **Ethereum-focused hackathon**, this time in Lisbon from 17-20 of October 2024.
ETHLisbon will be 3 days of non-stop building, bringing together the best Web 3.0 builders to the crypto capital of Europe and big money prizes.

*While this is an in-person event, there will be living streaming. Teams need to be on-site for the judging process, however remote participants can still engage and contribute. This event is open to everyone and participation is free. *

Check more info here and apply! https://ethlisbon.org/

[GOOGLE CALENDAR LINK](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/render?action=TEMPLATE&text=ETHLisbon+2024+Hackaton&dates=20241017T090000Z%2F20241020T180000Z&details=If+you%27re+into+decoding+challenges+on+privacy%2C+identity+and+web3+in+general%2C+don%27t+miss+out+on+the+chance+to+join+the+next+%2A%2AEthereum-focused+hackathon%2A%2A%2C+this+time+in+Lisbon+from+17-20+of+October+2024.%0D%0AETHLisbon+will+be+3+days+of+non-stop+building%2C+bringing+together+the+best+Web+3.0+builders+to+the+crypto+capital+of+Europe+and+big+money+prizes.%0D%0A%0D%0A%2AWhile+this+is+an+in-person+event%2C+there+will+be+living+streaming.+Teams+need+to+be+on-site+for+the+judging+process%2C+however+remote+participants+can+still+engage+and+contribute.+This+event+is+open+to+everyone+and+participation+is+free.+%2A%0D%0A%0D%0ACheck+more+info+here+and+apply%21+https%3A%2F%2Fethlisbon.org%2F&location=42+Lisboa)
